definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: :Is 23:2) coast, region 339 (contr. fr. [[אֱוִי]] so Ol:§ 152 b; place whither one betakes oneself for resting, etc., orig. fr. mariner's standpoint)—[[אִי]] abs. Is 20:6 +; cstr. Je 47:4; (Job 22:30 v. sub IV. [[אִי]] cf. Di) pl. [[אִיִּים]] Ps 72:10 +; [[אִיִּן]] Ez Eze 26:18 (Co [[איים]]) [[אִיֵּי]] Ge 10:5 +;—coast, border, region (mostly late), of Philistia & Phenicia with adjacent country Is 20:6, Is 23:2, Is 23:6; so of Caphtor (= Crete ) Je 47:4; [[מַלְכֵי הָאִי אֲשֶׁר בְּעֵבֶר הַיׇּם]] Je 25:22; elswh. pl., coasts of Chittim Je 2:10, Ez Eze 27:6, of Elishah v:Eze 27:7; different countries (on or in sea) v:Eze 27:3; v:Eze 27:15; v:Eze 27:35 Eze 26:15, Eze 26:18, Eze 26:18 (last del. Co cf. LXX) cf. Eze 39:6, so also [[אִיֵּי הַגּוֹיִם]] Ge 10:5 (P); partic. [[אִיֵּי הַיׇּם]] = coast-lands & islands Is 11:11, Is 24:15, ‖[[הָאָרֶץ]] Es 10:1; v. (without [[הַיׇּם]]) Da 11:18, & Ps 72:10; so oft. Is:Is 2 incl. inhabitants, Is 41:1, Is 41:5, Is 42:4, Is 42:10 ([[אִיִּים וְישְׁבֵיהֶם]] ‖[[הַיׇּם וּמְלאׁוֹ]]) v:Is 42:12, Is 49:1, Is 51:5, Is 59:18, Is 60:9, Is 66:19 cf. Je 31:10, Ps 97:1, Zep 2:11 ([[אִיֵּי הַגּוֹיִם]]); islands, distinctly (taken up by ´[[א]] as little things) Is 40:15; coasts, banks, i.e. habitable lands Is 42:15 (‖[[נְהָרוֹת]]).
